column1: @entity1 wakes up early this morning. He is so happy. Today @entity0 is taking him to theaquarium. @entity1 wants to see blue fish, red fish, yellow fish, and green fish. He alsowants to see really big fish.@entity0 and @entity1 are at the aquarium. "Look!" @entity1 says. "There's a big red fish!" The fish swims away. A small yellow fishswims up to the glass and looks at @entity1. "A yellow fish!" says @entity1, "He's tiny."Lots of blue fish swim by behind the yellow fish. "Look at all of those blue fish!" says @entity1. "They stay together."@entity0 points at a long fish and says "That one is as big as me!" @entity1 laughs. He still wants to find a green fish. He sees a lot of fish, but none ofthem are green."@entity0, I ca not find a green fish. I want to see a green fish." @entity0 laughs. "Let's go to the next window and look."@entity1 looks through the next window and sees lots of fish, but none of them are greenfish."I still do not see any green fish," says @entity1. "Look there," @entity0 tells him. @entity1 sees a green sea turtle! It's a lot bigger than afish.After looking at all the fish, @entity0 and @entity1 go home again.
